1.4.name: wordpress/wpmytwitpic
1.4.description:
wpMyTwitPic takes a twitter users images that have been uploaded to the TwitPic service and displays a custom number of them on a page.

The admin options require a valid twitter username and an integer to define the number of pictures to display.

You can define which page to display the images on by publishing a page with [wpMyTwitPic] in its body. Other text may also be placed above and under the [wpMyTwitPic] tag. It is suggested that a line break (carrige return) should be placed before and after the tag if any other text is to be used.
